symetricTensorMap
=================

Description
***********

**symetricTensorMap** is a class to store and work on symetric Tensor at each point of a 2D map. It is used to store strain tensor map from Digital Image Correlation here. But it can be used to store every kind of 3x3 Tensor on 2D map as stress or others.


Function
********
.. automodule:: DICToolbox.symetricTensorMap
	:special-members:
	:members:
